about_the_game:
Quiete is a hardcore open-world survival action RPG set during the Eon of the Forbidden Chant, when a calamity rendered the spoken word unusable. In this world, silence means survival.

Explore, fight, loot, and survive

Immerse in a land torn apart by conflict and mistery. Face deadly factions, uncover lost knowledge, and carve out your place. Ruthless warbands, enigmatic cults, and desperate survivors all fight for dominance.

Every battle and every discovery brings new risks and rewards.

Gather and return stronger

Resources, artifacts, and knowledge will be vital for your survival. Every item, every silent interaction, and every battle will shape your future.

Gather materials, unearth forgotten relics, and seek hidden truths to gain an edge in a world that offers no mercy.

Research and acquire knowledge to upgrade your loadouts

Craft better weapons, enhance your gear, and return to the fight better equipped for the dangers ahead.

Adapt, experiment, and forge the tools you need to overcome stronger foes and harsher challenges.

Survive alone or with allies

Team up with friends to share resources, plan silent strategies, and fight for survival together. In a world where words bring death, coordination and trust will determine who thrives and who fades into the void.
